description.narrative: The development objective of the Project is to increase the supply of cost-effective renewable wind electricity.

description.narrative: Total Commitment Cancellations in Fourth Quarter of 2016

condition.narrative: Sch 2, Sec 1.2 (a): The Recipient has established and operationalized the Special Purpose Company no later than 30 months after theeffective date, ensuring independent ownership and operation of the Wind Farm.

Sch 2, Sec 1.2 (b): The Special Purpose Company and the Public Electricity Corporation have not later than 36 months after theeffective date executed & delivered a power purchase agreement in form & substance satisfactory to the Association.

title.narrative: Generation Capacity of Renewable Energy (other than hydropower) constructed
Generation Capacity of Renewable Energy constructed – Wind
Economic Competitiveness of electricity generated by wind power
Consulting services for market development performed
